entry.title: Systematic regional MR to LR Land Coverage
entry.summary:
Title Systematic regional MR to LR Land Coverage
Description Europe, continuous wall-to-wall coverage (medium resolution for monitoring of seasonal/annual agricultural land use state and changes) in Reference years 2008-2012. <br><br> Africa, continuous wall-to-wall medium and low resolution environmental seasonal / annual change monitoring in Reference years 2008-2012. <br><br> This dataset will be built using instruments from <br> Mission Group 3: Medium-Resolution Land & Ocean Monitoring (imaging multispectral radiometers)
Type Collection
Date 2008-12-10T00:00:00/2011-05-31T00:00:00
Media Type ATOM | SRU
Metadata ISO

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Systematic regional MR to LR Land Coverage

entry.title: Illicit crops (North Africa and/or Columbia) VHR optical
entry.summary:
Title Illicit crops (North Africa and/or Columbia) VHR optical
Description Identification and monitoring of illicit crop sites with HR and VHR optical data with mapping frequency of 6 months<br> <br> Temporal extent of dataset: 2009-2010 for new acquisitions<br><br> This dataset is built using instruments from:<br> <ul> <li> Mission Group 2b: Very High Resolution multi-spectral imaging missions </li> </ul>
Type Collection
Date 2010-01-08T12:19:00/2011-05-31T19:00:00
Media Type ATOM | SRU
Metadata ISO

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Illicit crops (North Africa and/or Columbia) VHR optical

entry.title: CleanSeaNet and EMSA maritime surveillance in MR SAR
entry.summary:
Title CleanSeaNet and EMSA maritime surveillance in MR SAR
Description <b>Dataset description:</b> MR SAR for EMSA maritime applications <br> <b>Ordering mechanism:</b> On-demand <br> <b>Area of interest:</b> All European Seas (Atlantic, Baltic, Black, Mediterranean and North Seas). Areas outside EU waters may be addressed in case of EC and EU Member States interest <br> <b>Temporal extent of dataset:</b> New <br>
Type Collection
Date 2010-04-01T23:00:00/2011-05-31T00:00:00
Media Type ATOM | SRU
Metadata ISO

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: CleanSeaNet and EMSA maritime surveillance in MR SAR

gmd:supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString: Cosmo SkyMed; SAR2000/ScanSar WideRegion (HH or VV or cross- pol), single look; 100m NTC, Rush or NT, NRT <br> ENVISAT; ASAR/Wide Swath single pol; 150m NTC, Rush or NT, NRT <br>

entry.title: Data for sulphur dioxide (SO2) atmospheric composition monitoring and forecasting
entry.summary:
Title Data for sulphur dioxide (SO2) atmospheric composition monitoring and forecasting
Description Atmospheric composition analysis and forecast.<br> Data to be used for assimilation of sulphur dioxide in near-real-time atmospheric composition analysis and forecast and for reanalyses. <br><br> This dataset will be built using instruments from <br> Mission Group 4: Geostationary Atmospheric Monitoring and Mission Group 5: Low Earth Orbit Atmospheric Monitoring <br>atmospheric chemistry
Type Collection
Date 2010-03-16T12:19:00/2011-05-31T00:00:00
Media Type ATOM | SRU
Metadata ISO

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Data for sulphur dioxide (SO2) atmospheric composition monitoring and forecasting

entry.title: DAP-ID: DWH_MG2_CORE_10/DAP_MG2_25
entry.summary:
Title DAP-ID: DWH_MG2_CORE_10/DAP_MG2_25
Description <p>Land monitoring service: license extension to 2009-2010 sub-Saharan Africa coverage (DAP_MG2_25). This dataset will be built using instruments from Mission Group 2: optical high resolution multispectral Deimos-1, VNIR (3 bands).</p>
Type Collection
Date /
Media Type ATOM | SRU
Metadata ISO

gmd:alternateTitle.gco:CharacterString: Title: Access to former sub-Saharan Africa coverage

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: <p>Land monitoring service: license extension to 2009-2010 sub-Saharan Africa coverage (DAP_MG2_25). This dataset will be built using instruments from Mission Group 2: optical high resolution multispectral Deimos-1, VNIR (3 bands).</p>

entry.title: Ground deformation services VHR Optical
entry.summary:
Title Ground deformation services VHR Optical
Description Detection, mapping, monitoring and forecasting of ground deformations, at different temporal and spatial scales, and in various physiographic and environmental settings. <ul> <b><li>Ordering mechanism:</b> On demand: SPDRF form to be sent to SCI Operator</li> <b><li>Area of interest:</b> <li>Central Umbria (Italy), Dolomiti (Italy</li> <li>Hungarian lowland (Hungary)</li> <li>Silesian Coal Basin (Poland)</li> <li>Palma de Mallorca (Spain)</li> <li>Zermatt (Switzerland)</li> <li>St. Moritz (Switzerland)</li> <b><li>Temporal extent of dataset:</b> Until May 2011</li> <b><li>Acq window/Mapping frequency:</b> As per GSP request</li> <b><li>Delivery schedule:</b> On a product basis</li> <b><li>Delivery mechanism:</b> FTP@CDS</li> </ul>
Type Collection
Date 2011-04-18T15:27:00/2011-05-31T15:27:00
Media Type ATOM | SRU
Metadata ISO
